title: The City
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 17 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR10L
description: The City introduces students to the vocabulary of things they might see in a city. The book pairs realistic artwork with simple text.
meta: big, buildings, buses, cars, noise, park, people, stores, streets
Use the reading strategy of connecting to prior knowledge to make meaning from text
Main Idea and Details : Identify the main idea and details
Consonants : Associate the letter Pp with the sound /p/
Nouns : Understand that some words are naming words
